      • bindRequested

        void bindRequested(Long sessionId,
                 ServerConnectionImpl serverConnectionImpl,
                 com.cloudhopper.smpp.pdu.Pdu packet)
        Create new client after requested bind and choose server using round-robin algorithm
        Parameters:
        sessionId - session (client) id
        serverConnection - reference to server implementation in loadbalancer
        packet - PDU bind request received from client
